text: Knema hookeriana (sometimes misspelled K. hookerana) is a species of plant in the family Myristicaceae. It is a tree found in Sumatra, Peninsular Malaysia, Singapore, and Thailand. The Latin specific epithet hookeriana refers to William Jackson Hooker.Sue Gordon (Editor) ==References== * de Wilde, W.J.J.O. 1998. Knema hookerana. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species.
